title: Mid-Level Backend Engineer
summary: Experienced Backend Engineer with 4+ years of expertise in designing, developing, and deploying robust and scalable web applications. Proficient in Python, Django, and cloud platforms like AWS. Passionate about building high-performance systems and contributing to agile development teams.

cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, SQS, SNS)

description: Developed and maintained high-performance microservices using Python and FastAPI, contributing to a 20% reduction in API response times.
Designed and implemented robust RESTful APIs, integrating with various third-party services and internal systems.
Managed and optimized PostgreSQL databases, including schema design, query optimization, and performance tuning.
Deployed and managed applications on AWS using Docker and Kubernetes, ensuring high availability and scalability.
Collaborated with front-end developers, product managers, and QA teams in an Agile environment to deliver features on schedule.
Contributed to the development of a large-scale e-commerce platform using Python and Django.
Implemented new features and bug fixes, improving system stability and user experience.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and prevent regressions.
Assisted in migrating legacy services to a modern microservices architecture.
Participated in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and adhering to coding standards.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
